00024 FileSet::FileSet(QDomNode & fileSetNode): nameGroup_(fileSetNode), groups_(),
00025 files_(), defaultFileBuilders_(), dependencies_(), functions_() {
00026 
00027         for (int i = 0; i < fileSetNode.childNodes().count(); ++i) {
00028                 QDomNode tempNode = fileSetNode.childNodes().at(i);
00029 
00030                 if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:group")) {
00031                         QString groupName = tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue();
00032                         groupName = General::removeWhiteSpace(groupName);
00033                         groups_.append(groupName);
00034                 }
00035 
00036                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:file")) {
00037                         files_.append(QSharedPointer<File>(new File(tempNode, this)));
00038                 }
00039 
00040                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString(
00041                                 "spirit:defaultFileBuilder")) {
00042                         defaultFileBuilders_.append(
00043                                         QSharedPointer<FileBuilder>(new FileBuilder(tempNode)));
00044                 }
00045 
00046                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:dependency") ) {
00047                         dependencies_.append(tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue());
00048                 }
00049 
00050                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:function")) {
00051                         functions_.append(
00052                                         QSharedPointer<Function>(new Function(tempNode)));
00053                 }
00054         }
00055 
00056         // if mandatory field name is missing
00057         if (nameGroup_.name_.isNull()) {
00058                 throw Parse_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory element name missing in "
00059                                 "spirit:fileSet"));
00060         }
00061         return;
00062 }
00063 
00064 FileSet::FileSet(const QString name, const QString group): nameGroup_(),
00065                 groups_(),
00066                 files_(), defaultFileBuilders_(), dependencies_(), functions_() {
00067         groups_.append(group);
00068         nameGroup_.name_ = name;
00069 }

00071 FileSet::FileSet(): nameGroup_(), groups_(), files_(), defaultFileBuilders_(), 
00072 dependencies_(), functions_()  {
00073 }
00074 
00075 FileSet::FileSet( const FileSet &other ):
00076 nameGroup_(other.nameGroup_),
00077 groups_(other.groups_),
00078 files_(),
00079 defaultFileBuilders_(),
00080 dependencies_(other.dependencies_),
00081 functions_() {
00082 
00083         foreach (QSharedPointer<File> file, other.files_) {
00084                 if (file) {
00085                         QSharedPointer<File> copy = QSharedPointer<File>(
00086                                 new File(*file.data(), this));
00087                         files_.append(copy);
00088                 }
00089         }
00090 
00091         foreach (QSharedPointer<FileBuilder> fileBuilder, other.defaultFileBuilders_) {
00092                 if (fileBuilder) {
00093                         QSharedPointer<FileBuilder> copy = QSharedPointer<FileBuilder>(
00094                                 new FileBuilder(*fileBuilder.data()));
00095                         defaultFileBuilders_.append(copy);
00096                 }
00097         }
00098 
00099         foreach (QSharedPointer<Function> func, other.functions_) {
00100                 if (func) {
00101                         QSharedPointer<Function> copy = QSharedPointer<Function>(
00102                                 new Function(*func.data()));
00103                         functions_.append(copy);
00104                 }
00105         }
00106 }

00108 FileSet & FileSet::operator=( const FileSet &other ) {
00109         if (this != &other) {
00110                 nameGroup_ = other.nameGroup_;
00111                 groups_ = other.groups_;
00112                 dependencies_ = other.dependencies_;
00113 
00114                 files_.clear();
00115                 foreach (QSharedPointer<File> file, other.files_) {
00116                         if (file) {
00117                                 QSharedPointer<File> copy = QSharedPointer<File>(
00118                                         new File(*file.data(), this));
00119                                 files_.append(copy);
00120                         }
00121                 }
00122 
00123                 defaultFileBuilders_.clear();
00124                 foreach (QSharedPointer<FileBuilder> fileBuilder, other.defaultFileBuilders_) {
00125                         if (fileBuilder) {
00126                                 QSharedPointer<FileBuilder> copy = QSharedPointer<FileBuilder>(
00127                                         new FileBuilder(*fileBuilder.data()));
00128                                 defaultFileBuilders_.append(copy);
00129                         }
00130                 }
00131 
00132                 functions_.clear();
00133                 foreach (QSharedPointer<Function> func, other.functions_) {
00134                         if (func) {
00135                                 QSharedPointer<Function> copy = QSharedPointer<Function>(
00136                                         new Function(*func.data()));
00137                                 functions_.append(copy);
00138                         }
00139                 }
00140         }
00141         return *this;
00142 }

00147         functions_.clear();

00150 void FileSet::write(QXmlStreamWriter& writer) {
00151 
00152         writer.writeStartElement("spirit:fileSet");
00153 
00154         // if mandatory name is not defined
00155         if (nameGroup_.name_.isEmpty()) {
00156                 throw Write_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory name missing in "
00157                         "spirit:fileSet"));
00158         }
00159         else {
00160                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:name", nameGroup_.name_);
00161         }
00162 
00163         if (!nameGroup_.displayName_.isEmpty()) {
00164                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:displayName", nameGroup_.displayName_);
00165         }
00166 
00167         if (!nameGroup_.description_.isEmpty()) {
00168                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:description", nameGroup_.description_);
00169         }
00170 
00171         // if optional groups are defined
00172         for (int i = 0; i < groups_.size(); ++i) {
00173                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:group", groups_.at(i));
00174         }
00175 
00176         // tell each file to write itself
00177         for (int i = 0; i < files_.size(); ++i) {
00178                 files_.at(i)->write(writer);
00179         }
00180 
00181         // tell each defaultFileBuilder to write itself
00182         for (int i = 0; i < defaultFileBuilders_.size(); ++i) {
00183                 defaultFileBuilders_.at(i)->write(writer);
00184         }
00185 
00186         // write all dependencies
00187         for (int i = 0; i < dependencies_.size(); ++i) {
00188                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:dependency", dependencies_.at(i));
00189         }
00190 
00191         // tell each function to write itself
00192         for (int i = 0; i < functions_.size(); ++i) {
00193                 functions_.at(i)->write(writer);
00194         }
00195 
00196         writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:fileSet
00197 }

00262 const QList<QString> FileSet::getFilePaths() {
00263         QList<QString> filePaths;
00264 
00265         for (int i = 0; i < files_.size(); ++i) {
00266                 filePaths.append(files_.at(i)->getName());
00267         }
00268         return filePaths;

00271 QList<General::LibraryFilePair> FileSet::getVhdlLibraries() const {
00272 
00273         QList<General::LibraryFilePair> libraries;
00274 
00275         // go through all files
00276         foreach (QSharedPointer<File> file, files_) {
00277 
00278                 if (file->isVhdlFile()) {
00279                         QString filePath = file->getName();
00280                         QString libName = file->getLogicalName();
00281                         if (libName.isEmpty()) {
00282                                 libName = QString("work");
00283                         }
00284                         libraries.append(General::LibraryFilePair(filePath, libName));
00285                 }
00286         }
00287         return libraries;
00288 }
00289 
00290 QStringList FileSet::getVhdlLibraryNames() const {
00291 
00292         QStringList libraries;
00293         foreach (QSharedPointer<File> file, files_) {
00294                 // if file is vhdl and the library name is not yet on the list.
00295                 // and library is specified
00296                 if (file->isVhdlFile() && !file->getLogicalName().isEmpty() && 
00297                         !libraries.contains(file->getLogicalName())) {
00298                         libraries.append(file->getLogicalName());
00299                 }
00300         }
00301         return libraries;
00302 }
00303 
00304 QList<General::LibraryFilePair> FileSet::getVerilogLibraries() const {
00305         QList<General::LibraryFilePair> files;
00306 
00307         for (int i = 0; i < files_.size(); ++i) {
00308 
00309                 // if the file type is vhdl source
00310                 // IP-Xact says that atleast one file type MUST be specified.
00311                 if (files_.at(i)->getFileTypes().size() == 0 &&
00312                         files_.at(i)->getUserFileTypes().size() == 0) {
00313 
00314                                 throw Invalid_file(QObject::tr(
00315                                         "FileType is not defined within spirit:file in file: ") +
00316                                         files_.at(i)->getName());
00317                 }
00318 
00319                 // if fileType was defined and it is vhdlSource of some kind
00320                 if ((files_.at(i)->getFileTypes().size() != 0) &&
00321                         (files_.at(i)->getFileTypes().at(0) == QString("verilogSource") ||
00322                         files_.at(i)->getFileTypes().at(0) == QString("verilogSource-95")
00323                         || files_.at(i)->getFileTypes().at(0) == QString(
00324                         "verilogSource-2001"))) {
00325 
00326                                 QString filePath = files_.at(i)->getName();
00327 
00328                                 // add the library name to the list of libraries
00329                                 QString libName = files_.at(i)->getLogicalName();
00330 
00331                                 // if library name was not defined
00332                                 if (libName.isEmpty()) {
00333                                         // set the library name to be "work"
00334                                         libName = QString("work");
00335                                 }
00336 
00337                                 files.append(General::LibraryFilePair(filePath, libName));
00338                 }
00339         }
00340 
00341         return files;
00342 }
00343 
00344 void FileSet::addFile(File* file) {
00345 
00346         // search the files if there already exists a file with same name
00347         for (int i = 0; i < files_.size(); ++i) {
00348 
00349                 // if files have same name
00350                 if (files_.at(i)->getName() == file->getName()) {
00351 
00352                         // remove the old file and replace it with the new one
00353                         files_.removeAt(i);
00354 
00355                         // add the new file to the list
00356                         files_.append(QSharedPointer<File>(file));
00357                         
00358                         // tell the file that it now belongs to this file set.
00359                         file->setParent(this);
00360                         return;
00361                 }
00362         }
00363 
00364         // if there was no file with same name it is safe to append to file to the
00365         // file set
00366         files_.append(QSharedPointer<File>(file));
00367 }
00368 
00369 File* FileSet::getFile(const QString logicalName) const {
00370         // search all files
00371         for (int i = 0; i < files_.size(); ++i) {
00372 
00373                 // if the logical name matches
00374                 if (files_.at(i)->getLogicalName() == logicalName) {
00375                         return files_.at(i).data();
00376                 }
00377         }
00378 
00379         // no logical names matched
00380         return 0;
00381 }

00414 void FileSet::removeFile( const QString& fileName ) {
00415         
00416         for (int i = 0; i < files_.size(); ++i) {
00417 
00418                 // if the file is the specified one
00419                 if (files_.at(i)->getName() == fileName) {
00420                         files_.value(i).clear();
00421                         files_.removeAt(i);
00422                         return;
00423                 }
00424         }
00425 }
00426 
00427 void FileSet::removeFile( const File* file ) {
00428         for (int i = 0; i < files_.size(); ++i) {
00429 
00430                 // if the file is the specified one
00431                 if (*files_.at(i) == *file) {
00432                         files_[i].clear();
00433                         files_.removeAt(i);
00434                         break;
00435                 }
00436         }
00437 }

00439 File* FileSet::createFile() {
00440         files_.append(QSharedPointer<File>(new File(this)));
00441         return files_.last().data();

00450 QString FileSet::getDefaultCommand(const File* file ) const {
00451 
00452         if (!file)
00453                 return QString();
00454 
00455         // first search all file types
00456         QStringList fileTypes = file->getFileTypes();
00457         foreach (QString fileType, fileTypes) {
00458                 
00459                 // search each default file builder for each file type
00460                 foreach (QSharedPointer<FileBuilder> fileBuilder, defaultFileBuilders_) {
00461 
00462                         if (fileBuilder->hasFileType(fileType)) {
00463                                 return fileBuilder->getCommand();
00464                         }
00465                 }
00466         }
00467 
00468         // no match was found
00469         return QString();
00470 }
00471 
00472 QString FileSet::getDefaultFlags(const File* file ) const {
00473 
00474         if (!file)
00475                 return QString();
00476 
00477         // first search all file types
00478         QStringList fileTypes = file->getFileTypes();
00479         foreach (QString fileType, fileTypes) {
00480 
00481                 // search each default file builder for each file type
00482                 foreach (QSharedPointer<FileBuilder> fileBuilder, defaultFileBuilders_) {
00483 
00484                         if (fileBuilder->hasFileType(fileType)) {
00485                                 return fileBuilder->getFlags();
00486                         }
00487                 }
00488         }
00489 
00490         // no match was found
00491         return QString();
00492 }

00505 bool FileSet::contains( const QString& fileName ) const {
00506 
00507         foreach (QSharedPointer<File> file, files_) {
00508                 
00509                 if (file->getName() == fileName)
00510                         return true;
00511         }
00512         return false;
00513 }

00515 void FileSet::changeFileName( const QString& from, const QString& to ) {
00516 
00517         foreach (QSharedPointer<File> file, files_) {
00518 
00519                 if (file->getName() == from) {
00520                         file->setName(to);
00521                         return;
00522                 }
00523         }
00524 }

00526 File* FileSet::getQuartusPinMap() const {
00527

00529 
00530                 if (file->isQuartusPinmap())
00531                         return file.data();
00532         }
00533         // no pin map was found
00534         return 0;

00537 void FileSet::sortFiles( const QStringList& fileNames ) {
00538 
00539         QList<QSharedPointer<File> > tempList;
00540 
00541         // go through each file name in the correct order
00542         foreach (QString fileName, fileNames) {
00543 
00544                 // try to find a matching file
00545                 foreach (QSharedPointer<File> file, files_) {
00546                         
00547                         // if file is the one searched for
00548                         if (file->getName() == fileName)
00549                                 tempList.append(file);
00550                 }
00551         }
00552 
00553         // clear the original list
00554         files_.clear();
00555 
00556         // and set it to the sorted list.
00557         files_ = tempList;
00558 }
